TEXT.TITLE: PANSOPHIC SYSTEMS <PNS> SPLITS STOCK 2-FOR-1
TEXT.BODY: Pansophic Systems Inc said it will split its stock two-for-one effective April two to shareholders of record March 13. It also said it will pay a six cts per share dividend on the pre-split shares, a regular quarterly dividend, on April two to shareholders of record March 13. Reuter
